meanings.definition: Coins or banknotes used as a medium of exchange.
meanings.sent1: I used my moneys to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent2: She counted her moneys carefully before going shopping.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of moneys, ready to be spent.
meanings.sent4: His moneys jingled in his pocket as he walked.
meanings.sent5: The moneys in the cash register gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The moneys he won in the lottery changed his life.
meanings.sent2: They donated large moneys to the charity.
meanings.sent3: Finding unexpected moneys in his jacket made him smile.
meanings.sent4: Her moneys were like a safety net during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The moneys in the briefcase represented years of hard work.

meanings.sent1: Investing wisely can grow your moneys over time.
meanings.sent2: The company's moneys were tied up in various projects.
meanings.sent3: His moneys seemed to disappear whenever he went shopping.
meanings.sent4: She managed her moneys with great care and foresight.
meanings.sent5: The moneys available for the project were limited but sufficient.
